level.heading: Discontinuance or settlement.
level.text: A derivative proceeding shall not be discontinued or settled without the Superior Court's approval. If the court determines that a proposed discontinuance or settlement will substantially affect the interests of the members or a class of members of the nonprofit corporation, the court shall direct that notice be given to the members affected.
